name: UNPROTECTED HEX
description:
You are STRANDED IN SPACE with a torn-apart ship, and bandits are on your tail!

Rebuild your vessel and destroy the enemy pilots. Try to keep their weapons and shields intact so that you can use them yourself.

Build your ship back up to its former glory and defeat the BANDIT LEADER once and for all.

CONTROLS:

MOVE: W/A/S/D
ROTATE: Q/E
AIM: Mouse
SHOOT: Left Mouse Button
